summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.1°C) and outside temperature (down 5.4°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 10241 lux) and cloud levels (up 722 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12029 lux) and cloud levels (up 1669 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 721.5m lower than yesterday, 648.4m lower than the past week, 1668.7m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 1059m minimum and 3380m maximum, with an average of 1002.7m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1651.2m and 2670m.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Chance of light rain, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
